1563410.name: Ascension to BhEAveN
1563410.description: "Ascension to the Bheaven" is a thrilling parkour-based rage game that challenges players to ascend through a series of increasingly difficult obstacles. Inspired by the unforgiving gameplay of "Getting Over It," this game requires precision, patience, and resilience. Players will navigate through a beautifully crafted world, pushing the limits of their parkour skills to reach new heights. With its intense gameplay and the constant threat of losing progress, "Ascension to the Bheaven" promises an adrenaline-pumping experience for those daring enough to take on its challenge. Use the grappling hook, set the record and slide to the victory!
